plang.parser.tokenizer.token

Interface Token

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultToken

    public interface Token

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCurrentLine() 
      int getLine()
      Get the line where this token is identified
      int getPosition()
      Get the (end) position of this token Thus, start is: token.getPosition() - token.getText().length()) Conveniently implemented in DefaultToken as DefaultToken.getStartPosition()
      java.lang.String getText()
      Get the textual representation of this token (most often getText() == getValue())
      TokenType getType() 
      java.lang.Object getValue()
      Get the value of this token
      <T> T getValueSafe()
      Get the value of this token casted to T (i.e.
      void setCurrentLine(java.lang.String currentLine)

        Get the value of this token
        Returns:

      • getValueSafe

        <T> T getValueSafe()
        Get the value of this token casted to T (i.e. Number n = token.getValueSafe(); is valid as long as getValue() return Number)
        Returns:

      • getText

        java.lang.String getText()
        Get the textual representation of this token (most often getText() == getValue())

        Get the line where this token is identified
